resources.string: Your Printoid account helps you to synchronize your settings across multiple devices over the cloud.
Create your Printoid account with your email address:
Shall contain at least one lowercase
Shall contain at least one uppercase
Shall contain at least one digit
Your Printoid settings have been backed-up in your account!
Failed to backup your Printoid settings, please retry later!
Your Printoid settings have been restored from your account, the app will restart!
Failed to restore your Printoid settings, please retry later!
Your settings are already up-to-date, they do not need to be restored from your account
Account not created, please retry later!
Account signed-in with success! Welcome back, %s
Account not signed-in, please retry later!
The settings stored in your Printoid account seem to have changed. Do you want to restore them now on this device?\n\nPrintoid will need to restart after applying the modifications.
